comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:10.0a2) Gecko/20111128 Firefox/10.0a2
Build ID: 20111128042018

Steps to reproduce:

Opened the source of a javascript file from an error message in the webconsole.


Actual results:

The column of the cursor was reported correctly, but the line number was reported as NaN.


Expected results:

The line number should have been reported correctly.
comments.creator: nfitzgerald@mozilla.com
comments.author: nfitzgerald@mozilla.com

Steps to reproduce:

Opened the source of a javascript file from an error message in the webconsole.


Actual results:

The column of the cursor was reported correctly, but the line number was reported as NaN.


Expected results:

The line number should have been reported correctly.

comments.raw_text: Possibly related to https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=700361 but that was reportedly fixed in Firefox 10 and I am seeing this bug in Firefox 10.
comments.author: nfitzgerald@mozilla.com
